newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Jan 16.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Jan 16.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Saudi's Saad Trading and Contracting Group plans to invest 30 million riyals to establish an advanced training centre.
- Four men burst into supermarket in Jeddah on Wednesday, fire shots and steal 3,000 riyals.
- Jeddah chamber of commerce income stood at 53 million riyals in one year to June 1996.
- Industrail investments in Saudi Arabia's industrial area of al-Ehsa stand at 3.67 billion riyals.
